column1: #Text=" Female telegraph operator says : " Chief , all the river rescue ships have been sabotaged !
#Text=" Saikhan says : " Tenzin , am I glad to see you .
#Text=I was afraid you 'd been captured too .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I 'm the only Council member left .
#Text=" Saikhan says : " Amon has launched simultaneous attacks across the boroughs .
#Text=The police are trying to regain control but we 're spread too thin .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I need to send a wire .
#Text=" Male telegraph operator # 2 says : " To whom , Councilman ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " The general of the United Forces .
